ygData.subject: Re: Twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: i know what you mean. i quite often pass out fine steel weapons and free buffs to level 1 through 7 when ever i go back to halas. i do not consider this
ygData.messageBody:
i know what you mean. i quite often pass out fine
steel weapons and free buffs to level 1 through 7 when
ever i go back to halas. i do not consider this
twinking or power leveling, more of a helping hand. some
one had done this to me when i first started to play
and i have never forgotten it. recently i had a level
5 shaman came up to me for buffs. i thought it look
like he had some nice stuff so i took a look. he had
better stuff than my 35 shaman. i explain to him that i
only help low levels that really needed it. he got
real mad and start shouting about what he thought of
me. he was so abusive that several other players
ended up petitioning. on the other hand, i had one low
level tell me to wait around for a little bit after
helping him. he brought on his level 56 and gave me a +8
wis and str veil. i do not consider that twinking,
more of a reward for doing good deeds.<br><br>elryche
